subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: The colt was the undefeated 2-year-old champion and the prohibitive 1-to-10 favorite in Saturday’s Wood Memorial at Aqueduct, but he ran poorly to finish third.
snippet: The colt was the undefeated 2-year-old champion and the prohibitive 1-to-10 favorite in Saturday’s Wood Memorial at Aqueduct, but he ran poorly to finish third.
